dt: {bc}interior fittings (such as moldings or stairways) of wood
{bc}a place or state of concealment, seclusion, or anonymity

dt.t: witnesses came out of the {wi}woodwork{/wi} when a reward was offered

shortdef: work made of wood; especially : interior fittings (such as moldings or stairways) of wood
a place or state of concealment, seclusion, or anonymity

dt: {bc}to appear suddenly usually because one sees an opportunity to get something for oneself

dt.t: As soon as she won the lottery, people started {it}coming out of the woodwork{/it}, asking for money.

shortdef: to appear suddenly usually because one sees an opportunity to get something for oneself

dt: used in phrases such as {phrase}fade into the woodwork{/phrase} to describe someone or something that is not noticed or that seems to disappear

dt.t: He's so shy that he always seems to {it}fade into the woodwork{/it} at parties.

shortdef: —used in phrases such as fade into the woodwork to describe someone or something that is not noticed or that seems to disappear
